---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/cosmos/transfer/get-flow-status-transferred
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://cosmos-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/fd37503c-17d0-2164-8537-8f4a33f694a9' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `transfer_tx_broadcasting` to `completed`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "c1fae578-2519-4efc-9bde-c5a98451fc17",
  "state": "completed",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "from_account_address": "cosmos1786jjkh5xk43vcmrc490zn48fh8nl02tcur0ce",
    "to_account_address": "cosmos1lggpv0kydc7w9pqakxqdh932a6ve4t6m8ea7j0",
    "amount": "0.01",
    "gas_price": null,
    "gas_limit": null,
    "memo": null,
    "transfer_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": null,
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "F2EFCF0F3D5D6C34E87F82AC03C24118D79278F64C1B1B7DAE9A43CE1CB703F2",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "cosmos1786jjkh5xk43vcmrc490zn48fh8nl02tcur0ce",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "network_code": "cosmos",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-10-25T18:06:03.248Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-10-25T18:14:32.532Z"
}
```

### Token Transfer Flow Complete

Congratulations, you have successfully transferred your ATOM tokens!
